title: my client is rejected
body: please can you help me my client is being rejected by server and i can't play the game once i write the user name and password it doesn't log in because the server reject the version of my client my client version is 6.2.16_01_27_16_56

replies.body:
Hey there,

The only way to fix this issue is to [force a repatch](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq5), could you try this and let me know if it helps.
